description: A video game emoji, shown on major platforms as a console gamepad with D-pad, joysticks, and buttons.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the video game emoji is a vibrant representation of digital entertainment, often shown as a stylized game controller with prominent, rounded buttons. Its glossy finish and dynamic lighting give it a modern and engaging feel, embodying the excitement of gameplay. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for expressing a love for gaming, suggesting a fun activity, or celebrating a victory in a virtual world.
